Restructure modal functions: Posting functions
description:
Rename and consolidate posting functions:
- Rename scheduled_multi_post -> post_sightings_queue (scheduled daily 6pm ET)
- Keep multi_post as post_multiple_sightings (helper)
- Keep batch_post as post_single_sighting (helper)
- Remove scheduled_batch_post (redundant)
- Update schedule to daily 6pm ET (currently 7am UTC = 2am ET)
